author: DZISHOLTZ
title: Perfect place to stay when visiting NYC -
text: We love returning to The Gardens each time we visit NYC. There is always a warm welcome from staff. Everyone is helpful ,cheerful and friendly. The location is perfect for us in a neighborhood that has less noise than midtown locations - something we value because we don't live in a noisy city.
